edge: Jeet Gannguli is a composer who has worked on the soundtrack of Bhaiaji Superhit.
Raghav Sachar is a music director who has composed songs for Bhaiaji Superhit.
Amjad Nadeem is a lyricist who has written lyrics for some songs in Bhaiaji Superhit.
Sanjeev-Darshan are a music duo who have composed some songs for Bhaiaji Superhit.
Neerraj Pathak is a music composer who has also worked on the soundtrack of Bhaiaji Superhit.
The label responsible for releasing the soundtrack of Bhaiaji Superhit is Zee Music Company.
Jeet Gannguli has also composed music for the movie Jalebi.
Raghav Sachar has previously worked on the soundtrack of Helicopter Eela.
Sanjeev-Darshan have previously worked on the soundtrack of Yamla Pagla Deewana: Phir Se.
Raghav Sachar has also composed music for the movie Amavas.
Jeet Gannguli, Raghav Sachar, Sanjeev-Darshan and Neerraj Pathak have also worked on the soundtrack of Marudhar Express.
Both movies are produced by Aamir Khan, Aditya Dev, and Chandan Saxena.
Both songs are from the movies Bhaiaji Superhit (2018) and Amavas (2019), respectively.
Both songs are from the movie Bhaiaji Superhit (2018).
Both songs have lyrics written by Amjad Nadeem.
Both songs are from the movie Bhaiaji Superhit (2018) and have different singers, Amit Mishra for 'Naam Hai Bhaiaji' and Raftaar for 'Baby Jaanleva Hai'. Pawni Pandey sings in both songs.
Both versions of 'Do Naina' have lyrics written by Amjad Nadeem and are sung by Shafqat Amanat Ali Khan and Aakanksha Sharma, respectively.
